title: The Blockies Guide - Managing weeds on small farms and acres

subtasks: Controlling weed spread through preventative practices.
Inspecting property regularly for new weed incursions.
Implementing appropriate control techniques for identified weeds.
Using a holding paddock or yard for new livestock.
Cleaning vehicles and machinery at a dedicated, well-equipped area.
Inspecting feed distribution areas and new stock locations.
Using the Department of Primary Industries Weedwise app for identification.
Contacting local authority for weed management advice.
Consulting state department resources for management advice.
